location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 27 of 1866 from Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bombay to Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding an enclosed letter from the late Sultan of Muscat (Thuwaini bin Said), received prior to his death, regarding his desire to provide for the future safety of his minister and seeking government's approval to provide protection to the minister. The minister's name is not given in the letter.
